full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL HE RU KA DPAL 'KHOR LO SDOM PA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
translator_(орчуулагч): PAD MA KA RA WAR MA, RIN CHEN BZANG PO,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @208B DPAL HE RU KA DPAL 'KHOR LO SDOM PA ZHES BYA BA, RNAL 'BYOR MA CHEN MO'I RGYUD KYI RGYAL PO LAS, LE'U LNGA BCU RTZA GCIG PA RDZOGS SO,, ` ,,DPAL HE RU KAR BRJOD PA 'BUM GYI NANG NAS PHYUNG BA, GRUB PA'I RTOG PA RMAD DU BYUNG BA NGO MTSAR DANG BCAS PAR BYED PA, BSTAN BCOS THAMS CAD KYI RGYAL PO, DPAL HE RU KA DPA' @209A *, ,PO CHEN PO KLAGS PAS 'GRUB PA, GZHAN THAMS CAD KYIS MI THUB PA, GDOD NAS GRUB PA'I BLA MA YIN NO, ,` , ,(RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO PAD MA KA RA WAR MA DANG, ZHU CHEN GYI LO TZTSA BA DGE SLONG RIN CHEN BZANG POS BSGYUR CING ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB PA'O,,) ,,` RGYAL BA'I GSUNG GI GCES MDZOD GSANG @209B BA'I RGYUD, ,BZHENGS PA'I DGE BAS TSE RABS KUN TU BDAG ,DPA' PO RNAL 'BYOR MA YIS RJES BZUNGS NAS, ,ZUNG 'JUG BDE BA CHE LA SPYOD GYUR CIG , ,,TSUL 'DI SGRUB LA THOGS MED MTHU LDAN PA'I, ,'DZAM GLING GNAS MCHOG NYI SHU RTZA BZHI YI, ,DPA' PO RNAL 'BYOR MA NI 'KHOR BCAS KYIS, ,GA-YEL @210A *, ,MA MED PAR RTAG TU GROGS BYED SHOG , ,,
